sn35.20:4.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpe abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35.20:4.2: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35.20:4.8: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.20:5.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpe nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35.20:5.2: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35.20:5.8: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
